org.sakaiproject.api.app.messageforums

Interface SynopticMsgcntrManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SynopticMsgcntrManagerImpl

    public interface SynopticMsgcntrManager

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createOrUpdateSynopticToolInfo(String userId, String siteId, String siteTitle, int unreadMessageCount, int unreadForumCount) 
      SynopticMsgcntrItem createSynopticMsgcntrItem(String userId, String siteId, String siteTitle) 
      void decrementForumSynopticToolInfo(String userId, String siteId) 
      void decrementMessagesSynopticToolInfo(String userId, String siteId) 
      void deleteSynopticMsgcntrItem(SynopticMsgcntrItem item) 
      SynopticMsgcntrItem getSiteSynopticMsgcntrItem(String userId, String siteId) 
      HashMap<String,Integer> getUserToNewMessagesForForumMap(String siteId, Long forumId, Long topicId)
      This method is used to get live information regarding the new message count per user for a forum ID This information can be used to compare against a later current information set after an event takes place (ie. after saving a forum) By only looking at the one forum that was updated, we can compare the two results and update the synoptic data based on the difference while avoiding calling unneeded forums, which can slow down this process significantly If topic ID is null, then it is ignored
      List<SynopticMsgcntrItem> getWorkspaceSynopticMsgcntrItems(String userId) 
      void incrementForumSynopticToolInfo(String userId, String siteId) 
      void incrementMessagesSynopticToolInfo(String userId, String siteId) 
      void resetAllUsersSynopticInfoInSite(String siteId) 
      void resetAllUsersSynopticInfoInSite(String siteId, List<String> users) 
      void resetMessagesAndForumSynopticInfo(String userId, String siteId) 
      void saveSynopticMsgcntrItem(SynopticMsgcntrItem item) 
      void setForumSynopticInfoHelper(String userId, String siteId, int newMessageCount) 
      void setMessagesSynopticInfoHelper(String userId, String siteId, int newMessageCount) 
      void updateAllSiteTitles(String siteId, String siteTitle) 
      void updateSynopticMessagesForForumComparingOldMessagesCount(String siteId, Long forumId, Long topicId, HashMap<String,Integer> previousCountHM)
      This is used (in conjunction with getUserToNewMessagesForForumMap) to update the difference between a previousCountHM and the current new message count for the forumId passed.

      • getUserToNewMessagesForForumMap

        HashMap<String,Integer> getUserToNewMessagesForForumMap(String siteId,
                                                      Long forumId,
                                                      Long topicId)
        This method is used to get live information regarding the new message count per user for a forum ID This information can be used to compare against a later current information set after an event takes place (ie. after saving a forum) By only looking at the one forum that was updated, we can compare the two results and update the synoptic data based on the difference while avoiding calling unneeded forums, which can slow down this process significantly If topic ID is null, then it is ignored
        Parameters:
        siteId -
        forumId -
        topicId -
        Returns:

      • updateSynopticMessagesForForumComparingOldMessagesCount

        void updateSynopticMessagesForForumComparingOldMessagesCount(String siteId,
                                                           Long forumId,
                                                           Long topicId,
                                                           HashMap<String,Integer> previousCountHM)
        This is used (in conjunction with getUserToNewMessagesForForumMap) to update the difference between a previousCountHM and the current new message count for the forumId passed. If topic ID is null, then it is ignored
        Parameters:
        siteId -
        forumId -
        topicId -
        previousCountHM -
